description.english: Jumpstart the heart of the boombox
description.german: Bring das Herz des Gettoblasters zum Pochen.
description.french: Réveille le cœur de la Radio
description.italian: Vai dritto al cuore dello stereo
description.spanish: Acelera el corazón del equipo estéreo
description.portuguese: Dê partida no coração da boombox

description.english: Try the 9 rhythmic combinations in the first level
description.german: Versuche die 9 Rhythmuskombos im ersten Level.
description.french: Expérimente la création de rythme électronique
description.italian: Prova le 9 combinazioni ritmiche nel primo livello
description.spanish: Prueba las 9 combinaciones rítmicas en el primer nivel
description.russian: Попробуйте 9 ритмичных комбинаций на первом уровне
description.portuguese: Experimente as 9 combinações rítmicas no primeiro nível

description.english: Squash 10 spiders in the same run
description.german: Zerquetsche in einem Lauf 10 Spinnen.
description.french: Ecrase un grand nombre d'araignées
description.spanish: Aplasta 10 arañas en la misma carrera

description.english: Find the secret area in the second electro level
description.german: Finde den versteckten Schatz.
description.french: Trouve le trésor caché
description.spanish: Encuentra el tesoro oculto

description.english: Collect all elevator sounds in the third electro level
description.german: Sammele alle Stücke Fahrstuhlmusik im dritten Elektro-Level.
description.french: Collecte les sons du monte-charge
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i suoni dell'ascensore nel terzo livello elettronico
description.spanish: Recoge todos los sonidos de ascensor en el tercer nivel de electro
description.russian: Соберите все звуки лифта в третьем уровне электронной музыки.
description.portuguese: Colete todos os sons de elevador no terceiro nível electro

description.english: Interact with all of the buttons of the mixing table
description.german: Interagiere mit allen Knöpfen auf dem Mischpult.
description.french: Expérimente le mixage de musique dub
description.italian: Interagisci con tutti i pulsanti del tavolo di mixaggio
description.spanish: Interactuar con todos los botones de la mesa de mezclas
description.russian: Нажмите на все кнопки на микшере.
description.portuguese: Interaja com todos os botões da mesa de mixagem

description.english: Change the ambiant music 20 times in the same run
description.german: Ändere die Hintergrundmusik 20 Mal in einem Lauf.
description.french: Profite bien des différentes ambiances!
description.italian: Cambia la musica di sottofondo 20 volte in una sessione
description.spanish: Cambia la música ambiente 20 veces en la misma ronda
description.russian: Измените музыку окружения 20 раз за одно прохождение.
description.portuguese: Mude a música ambiente 20 vezes na mesma corrida

description.english: Perform a perfect at the piano mini game
description.german: Spiele ein perfektes Minispiel am Klavier.
description.french: Faire un 100% lors du mini-jeu du piano
description.italian: Offri una prestazione perfetta nel minigioco del piano
description.spanish: Consigue un resultado perfecto en el minijuego del piano
description.russian: Получите высший рейтинг в мини-игре на пианино.
description.portuguese: Consiga um perfeito no minijogo do piano

description.english: Open the three VIP doors
description.german: Öffne die drei VIP-Türen.
description.french: Profite bien des coulisses !
description.spanish: Abre las tres puertas para VIP

description.english: Turn on each character of the sequencer
description.german: Schalte jeden Charakter am Sequencer ein.
description.french: Tout le monde doit chanter
description.spanish: Activa a cada personaje en el secuenciador

description.english: Bounce 5 times on the same bumper
description.german: Hüpfe 5 Mal auf dem gleichen Sprungkissen.
description.french: Rebondis plusieurs fois sur le même bumper
description.spanish: Rebota 5 veces en el mismo tope

description.english: Miss 5 actions in a row
description.german: Verpasse 5 Aktionen in Folge.
description.french: T'as compris les règles ?
description.spanish: ¿Entiendes la reglas?

description.english: Finish a level without rhytmic help
description.german: Schließe einen Level ohne die Rhythmushilfe ab.
description.french: Termine un niveau sans le système d'aide
description.italian: Completa un livello senza guida ritmica
description.spanish: Acaba un nivel sin ayuda rítmica
description.russian: Завершите уровень, не воспользовавшись помощью с ритмом.
description.portuguese: Termine um nível sem ajuda rítmica

description.english: Pulse 20 times in one run
description.german: Nutze in einem Lauf 20 Mal Schwingungen.
description.french: Garde le rythme en pulsant
description.spanish: Pulsa 20 veces en un mismo recorrido
description.russian: Совершите пульсацию 20 раз за одно прохождение

description.english: Finish all electro levels
description.german: Schließe alle Elektro-Level ab.
description.french: Termine le dernier niveau du monde électronique
description.spanish: Acaba todos los niveles de electro

description.english: Finish all disco levels
description.german: Schließe alle Disco-Level ab.
description.french: Termine le dernier niveau du monde disco
description.spanish: Acaba todos los niveles de disco

description.english: Finish all dub levels
description.german: Schließe alle Dub-Level ab.
description.french: Termine le dernier niveau du monde dub
description.spanish: Acaba todos los niveles de dub

description.english: Beat the disco boss
description.german: Besiege den Disco-Boss
description.french: Termine la séquence du boss du monde disco
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe de la música disco

description.english: Beat the dub boss
description.german: Beat the dub boss
description.french: Terminer la séquence du boss du monde dub
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe de la música dub

description.english: Win the final battle
description.german: Gewinne den Endkampf.
description.french: Gagner la bataille finale
description.spanish: Gana la batalla definitiva

description.english: Finish all Time Attack levels
description.german: Schließe alle Level gegen die Zeit ab.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux en mode Time Attack
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli delle Sfide a tempo
description.spanish: Acaba todos los niveles de Contrarreloj
description.russian: Завершите все уровни в режиме «Игра на время».
description.portuguese: Termine todos os níveis do Ataque de Tempo

description.english: Finish one Time Attack level
description.german: Schließe einen Level gegen die Zeit ab.
description.french: Terminer un niveau mode Time Attack
description.italian: Completa un livello delle Sfide a tempo
description.spanish: Acaba un nivel de Contrarreloj
description.russian: Завершите один уровень в режиме «Игра на время».
description.portuguese: Termine um nível Ataque de Tempo

description.english: Get a score of over 500 000 000 in Time Attack mode
description.german: Erhalte im Modus „Gegen die Zeit“ mehr als 500 Millionen Punkte.
description.french: Obtenir un score supérieur à 500 000 000 en mode Time Attack
description.italian: Totalizza oltre 500 milioni di punti in una Sfida a tempo
description.spanish: Supera una puntuación de 500 millones en modo Contrarreloj
description.russian: Получите более 500 миллионов очков в режиме «Игра на время».
description.portuguese: Obtenha uma pontuação de mais de 500 milhões no modo Ataque de Tempo

description.english: Get the maximum score in Time Attack mode
description.german: Schaffe im Modus „Gegen die Zeit“ die maximale Kombo.
description.french: Atteindre le nombre de combo maximal en mode Time Attack
description.italian: Raggiungi la combo massima in una Sfida a tempo
description.spanish: Consigue el combo máximo en modo Contrarreloj
description.russian: Получите максимальное комбо в режиме «Игра на время».
description.portuguese: Obtenha o combo máximo no modo Ataque de Tempo

displayName.english: My ears hear no more, Sire!
displayName.german: Meine Ohren sind taub, der Herr!
displayName.italian: Le mie orecchie non odono più, Maestà!
displayName.portuguese: Meus ouvidos não ouvem mais nada, senhor!

description.english: Try to mute the game in the settings
description.german: Versuche, das Spiel in den Einstellungen stumm zu schalten.
description.french: Essayer de mettre le jeu en muet
description.italian: Prova ad azzerare l'audio di gioco dalle impostazioni
description.spanish: Intenta silenciar el juego en la configuración
description.portuguese: Experimente deixar o jogo mudo nas configurações
